comments.body: Satyavani is a really good teacher but extremely strict, don't be late to her cls . The same goes with divya prabha, a really good teacher but strict . Monika goyal is a pretty chill teacher , as for the rest don't have much idea about them.
Your ddco is gonna be a rollercoaster ride.... she's horrible at teaching and strict....math I heard she strict but teaches very well...
